PB.t: [计] 10的15次方字节\n[医] 铅(82号元素)

pba.t: abbr. poor bloody assistant 贫血辅助器; pressure-breathing assister 加压呼吸辅助器; published by arrangement 按计划出版

pbbs.t: abbr. peripheral blood basophils 外周血嗜碱性粒细胞

pbc.t: abbr. primary biliary cirrhosis 原发性胆汁性肝硬化; peripheral bus computer 外围总线计算机; point of basal convergence 基线交汇点; pregnancy and birth complication(s) 怀孕和生产并发症

pbd.t: abbr. paperboard 纸板; particle board 刨花板，木屑纤维板

PBE.t: [医] 牛结核菌乳剂(牛型结核菌经培养后制成的结核菌素)

pbenethium hydroxynaphthoicum.t: [医] 羟基萘酸酚乙铵(灭虫宁)

pbf.t: [医][=peripheral blood flow]外周血流（量），末梢血流量

pbgc.t: abbr. Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation 退休金付给保证公司

pbis.t: abbr. peripheral bus interface slave 外围总线辅助接口

Pbit.t: [网络] 息税前利润(Profit Before Interest and Tax)；税前盈利；自检测

pbm.t: abbr. performance-based management 基于执行的管理经营; peribacteroid membrane 拟杆菌周膜

pbmc.t: [医][=peripheral blood monouclear cells]外周血单核细胞

pbmr.t: abbr. Provisional Basic Military Requirements 临时基本军事需要

pbn.t: [医][=paralytic brachial neuritis]麻痹性臂丛神经炎

pbotomethemoglobin.t: [医] 光变性血红蛋白(光作用于高铁血红蛋白的产物)

pbr.t: abbr. payment by results 按产出付款; point-blank range 直射距离; power breeder reactor 动力增殖反应堆; precision bombing range 瞄准轰炸靶场

pbs.t: abbr. （美）公共广播公司（Public Broadcasting Service）

PBT.t: [化] 聚对苯二甲酸丁二酯

pbts.t: abbr. public basic telecommunication services 公用基本通信业务

pbw.t: abbr. particle-beam weapon 粒子束武器; parts by weight 重量份（数）; posterior bite wing 后颌翼片; 后咬合翼片
